pages.text: $(bgreen)Cactus$()' spikes belie a spongy heart filled with love and goodwill. She just wants to hug and be hugged. Most folks can't hang with that, but she doesn't mind.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)125$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : She is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)one thorn$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy, and can spike enemies who attack it for $(bred)double damage$().

$(bpurple)Special :$() She can $(bred)stretch herself$() to fit different height. She can Attack $(bred)fly target$().$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will turn $(baqua)blue spikes$(), and deal $(bred)double damage$(), and its thron can $(l)attack several target$().
